txt.en:
'Good day to you, [placeholder]! Here for the festival, are you? Well, as you may know, our main event is the Taste of Hobbiton! It's a combination race and eating contest.

'In the end, only one hobbit will have the endurance and pluck needed to roll across the finish line first!

'Let me know if you are interested in tickets!'

'Here you are, [placeholder] -- two tickets to the main event!

'Judging the winner is harder than you might think -- I find that the slender ones run faster but fill up more quickly than the stout ones...who's to say who has the real advantage?

'Oh, and should you come back around later, I should be able to scare up a few more tickets for you!
Taste of Hobbiton: Off to the Races

You can receive one pair of free tickets to the Taste of Hobbiton (accessible from taking a horse from Michel Delving).\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Talk to Dodder Twofoot at the Taste of Hobbiton
Speak with Dodder Twofoot to receive two free tickets to the Taste of Hobbiton.
